headline: Stream BBC News Service about Ukraine
description:
The BBC is relaunching the News Service for Ukraine/Russia. https://tech.slashdot.org/story/22/03/04/1357239/bbc-resurrects-wwii-era-shortwave-broadcasts-as-russia-blocks-news-of-ukraine-invasion?utm_source=rss1.0mainlinkanon&utm_medium=feed

Is this streamable or is there a recorded archive where I can listen to it later?
headline_zh-Hans: 播放BBC关于乌克兰的新闻服务
headline_zh-Hant: 播放BBC關於烏克蘭的新聞服務
description_zh-Hans:
https://tech.slashdot.org/story/22/03/04/1357239/bbc-resurrects-wwii-era-shortwave-broadcasts-as-russia-blocks-news-of-ukraine-invasion?utm_source=rss1.0mainlinkanon&utm_medium=feed

这是可流动的，还是有一个录音档案，我可以在以后听？
description_zh-Hant:
https://tech.slashdot.org/story/22/03/04/1357239/bbc-resurrects-wwii-era-shortwave-broadcasts-as-russia-blocks-news-of-ukraine-invasion?utm_source=rss1.0mainlinkanon&utm_medium=feed

這是可流動的，還是有一個錄音檔案，我可以在以後聽？
